title: Prince Edward Island
author: CameronJM
pages:
Prince Edward Island

Joined Canada in 1873

The Capital is
Charlottetown

It is the birthplace of
Confederation.

It is know as Abegweit
or Epekwitk by the
Mi'kmaq (indigenous
people of PEI)

When the Island was
part of Acadia settled
by French colonist it
was called Ile
Saint-Jean.

After the British took
over the territory,
they named it after
Prince Edward, Duke
of Kent and
Strathearn
